name: vault-ai (pashpashpash)
description: [项目级] OP Vault ChatGPT: Give ChatGPT long-term memory using the OP Stack (OpenAI + Pinecone Vector Database). Upload your own custom knowledge base files (PDF, txt, epub, etc) using a simple React frontend.。来源: https://github.com/pashpashpash/vault-ai

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
OP Vault ChatGPT: Give ChatGPT long-term memory using the OP Stack (OpenAI + Pinecone Vector Database). Upload your own custom knowledge base files (PDF, txt, epub, etc) using a simple React frontend.

来源: https://github.com/pashpashpash/vault-ai
语言: JavaScript
Stars: 3402
